behaviors._lookBehavior: Look Behavior - Bot looks at nearby entities and players
behaviors._sleepBehavior: Sleep Behavior - Bot automatically sleeps in beds at night
behaviors._eatBehavior: Eat Behavior - Bot automatically eats when food level is low
behaviors._farmingBehavior: Farming Behavior - Bot automatically harvests and replants crops
behaviors._itemCollector: Item Collector - Bot automatically picks up nearby items
behaviors._woodcuttingBehavior: Woodcutting Behavior - Bot harvests trees, pillars up tall trees, replants saplings

woodcutting._pillarSettings: Pillar/Scaffold Settings - Blocks used for climbing tall trees
woodcutting._timingSettings: Timing Settings (milliseconds) - Adjust these for server latency/performance issues
woodcutting._timingHelp: Increase values if bot has placement issues, misses blocks, or server has high latency
woodcutting._pillarPreDelayHelp: Wait time before placing pillar block (ensures bot is centered). Default: 150ms
woodcutting._pillarJumpDelayHelp: Delay while jumping before placing block (gives time for jump to register). Default: 100ms
woodcutting._pillarPlaceDelayHelp: Wait after placing pillar block before moving up. Default: 100ms
woodcutting._pillarMoveDelayHelp: Delay between each of the 3 pillar steps when climbing. Default: 80ms
woodcutting._baseBreakDelayHelp: Wait after breaking base log (longer to let drops spawn). Default: 250ms
woodcutting._logBreakDelayHelp: Delay between breaking individual logs. Default: 100ms
woodcutting._cleanupDigDelayHelp: Wait between digging each scaffold block during cleanup. Default: 80ms

behaviors._miningBehavior: Mining Behavior - Bot mines in various patterns (strip-mining, quarry, tunnels)

mining._depositThresholdHelp: Number of items before returning to deposit (320 = 5 stacks)
mining._returnOnFullInventoryHelp: If true, bot returns to chest when inventory is full
mining._stripMiningSettings: Strip Mining Mode - Main tunnel with side branches
mining._stripBranchSpacingHelp: Blocks between each side branch (3 leaves 2 blocks between branches for ore visibility)
mining._quarrySettings: Quarry Mode - Square area excavation (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED)
mining._quarryHelp: Quarry mode is a placeholder for future implementation
mining._tunnelHelp: Creates a 2x2 tunnel in specified direction
mining._torchHelp: Automatic torch placement at intervals - future implementation
mining._toolMinDurabilityHelp: Minimum tool durability before needing replacement
mining._obstacleHandling: Obstacle Detection and Handling - NEW v2.0.1
mining._handleObstaclesHelp: Enables automatic detection and handling of holes, water, and lava
mining._bridgeGapsHelp: Automatically bridge gaps/holes to maintain Y level
mining._coverWaterHelp: Cover water pockets with blocks to allow safe passage
mining._coverLavaHelp: Cover lava pockets with blocks to prevent damage
mining._bridgingMaterialsHelp: Preferred materials for bridging (in priority order). Bot will use cobblestone first if available, then dirt, etc.
mining._maxBridgeDistanceHelp: Maximum distance (blocks) the bot will bridge in one go
mining._keepBridgingTotalHelp: Total blocks of bridging materials to keep across all types (e.g., 64 = one stack)
mining._keepFoodMinHelp: Minimum edible items to keep after deposit
mining._safetyHelp: Light level checks and mob avoidance - future implementation

_pathCache: Path Caching System - Reduces lag by caching frequently used routes

pathCache._maxCacheSizeHelp: Maximum number of cached paths to store
pathCache._pathValidityRadiusHelp: Radius (blocks) to check for changes that invalidate cached paths
pathCache._cacheExpirationHelp: Time (ms) before cached paths expire (300000 = 5 minutes)
pathCache._minPathLengthHelp: Minimum path length to cache (shorter paths not worth caching)

_whisperPatterns: Whisper Pattern Detection - Enables bot to respond to whispers from different chat plugins

whisperPatterns.name: custom_plugin
whisperPatterns._help: Custom plugin format: [Plugin]<Player> Username whispers to you: Message

whisperPatterns.name: vanilla_style
whisperPatterns._help: Vanilla format: Username whispers to you: Message

_dashboard: Web Dashboard - Optional web interface for monitoring bot status

dashboard._help: Access dashboard at http://localhost:3000 when enabled
